scripts.start:dev: export REACT_APP_METRICS_API_URL=http://localhost:5002 && export REACT_APP_AMP_METRICS_API_URL=http://amp-metric-api.us-west-1.elasticbeanstalk.com/ && export REACT_APP_API_URL=http://localhost:8000 && react-scripts start
scripts.deploy: CI=false yarn build && aws s3 sync build/ s3://gida-tracking  --acl public-read --delete
scripts.deploy-dev: CI=false REACT_APP_API_URL=https://gida-tracking-api-test.ghscosting.org yarn build && aws s3 sync build/ s3://gida-tracking-dev  --acl public-read --delete
scripts.deploy-remake: CI=false && REACT_APP_METRICS_API_URL=https://metric-api-test.talusanalytics.com && REACT_APP_AMP_METRICS_API_URL=https://metric-api-test.talusanalytics.com && REACT_APP_API_URL=https://ghs-tracking-api-dev.ghscosting.org && yarn build && aws s3 sync build/ s3://ghs-tracking-dev  --acl public-read --delete
scripts.deploy-dev-new: CI=false && REACT_APP_METRICS_API_URL=https://metric-api-test.talusanalytics.com && REACT_APP_AMP_METRICS_API_URL=https://metric-api-test.talusanalytics.com && REACT_APP_API_URL=https://ghs-tracking-api-dev.ghscosting.org && yarn build && aws s3 sync build/ s3://gida-tracking-dev  --acl public-read --delete
scripts.deploy-prod: CI=false && REACT_APP_METRICS_API_URL=https://metric-api-test.talusanalytics.com && REACT_APP_AMP_METRICS_API_URL=https://metric-api-test.talusanalytics.com && REACT_APP_API_URL=https://ghs-tracking-api.ghscosting.org && yarn build && aws s3 sync build/ s3://ghs-tracking  --acl public-read --delete
